statements: SELECT * FROM Customer_Subscription_Plans;
SELECT plan_name, price FROM Customer_Subscription_Plans WHERE tier = 2;
SELECT plan_name, tier FROM Customer_Subscription_Plans WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Subscription_Plans ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Subscription_Plans WHERE tier = 1 ORDER BY plan_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Subscription_Plans WHERE tier = 1 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT plan_name, price FROM Customer_Subscription_Plans WHERE price > 50;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_plans, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM Customer_Subscription_Plans;
SELECT plan_name, tier, price FROM Customer_Subscription_Plans WHERE tier IN (1, 2) ORDER BY tier, price;
SELECT plan_name, price, CONCAT('Tier ', tier) AS tier_info FROM Customer_Subscription_Plans WHERE price BETWEEN 30 AND 100 ORDER BY price;
SELECT * FROM customer_subscription_plans;
SELECT plan_name, monthly_price FROM customer_subscription_plans WHERE monthly_price > 50;
SELECT plan_name, monthly_price FROM customer_subscription_plans ORDER BY monthly_price DESC;
SELECT C.plan_name, P.tier_name, P.tier_price FROM customer_subscription_plans C JOIN pricing_tiers P ON C.plan_id = P.plan_id;
SELECT * FROM pricing_tiers WHERE tier_price BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM customer_subscription_plans;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name FROM customer_subscription_plans ORDER BY monthly_price DESC;
SELECT plan_name, monthly_price FROM customer_subscription_plans WHERE monthly_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM pricing_tiers WHERE tier_price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY tier_name ASC;
SELECT plan_name, tier_name, tier_price FROM customer_subscription_plans JOIN pricing_tiers ON customer_subscription_plans.plan_id = pricing_tiers.plan_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_subscription_plans;
SELECT plan_name, price FROM customer_subscription_plans ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT tier_name, price FROM pricing_tiers WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, plan_id, start_date FROM subscriptions WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_subscription_plans WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY plan_name DESC;
SELECT plan_name, COUNT(*) FROM customer_subscription_plans GROUP BY plan_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT plan_name FROM customer_subscription_plans WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT plan_name, price FROM customer_subscription_plans WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT subscriptions.subscription_id, customer_id, plan_name, tier_name, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions INNER JOIN customer_subscription_plans ON subscriptions.plan_id = customer_subscription_plans.id INNER JOIN pricing_tiers ON subscriptions.tier_id = pricing_tiers.tier_id ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_plans;
SELECT plan_name, monthly_price FROM customer_plans ORDER BY monthly_price DESC;
SELECT tier_name, tier_value FROM pricing_tiers WHERE tier_value > 100;
SELECT customer_id, plan_id, start_date FROM customer_subscriptions WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT subscription_id, status, change_date FROM subscription_history ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_plans;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name FROM customer_plans WHERE monthly_price > 100;
SELECT customer_id, plan_name, start_date FROM customer_subscriptions JOIN customer_plans ON customer_subscriptions.plan_id = customer_plans.plan_id;
SELECT tier_name, tier_value FROM pricing_tiers WHERE tier_value < 50 ORDER BY tier_name DESC;
SELECT history_id, status, change_date FROM subscription_history WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT plan_name, price FROM plans ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM customers JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id WHERE payments.amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM customers JOIN subscriptions ON customers.customer_id = subscriptions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, created_at FROM customers ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, subscriptions.start_date, plans.plan_name FROM customers JOIN subscriptions ON customers.customer_id = subscriptions.customer_id JOIN plans ON subscriptions.plan_id = plans.plan_id;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(subscription_id) AS total_subscriptions FROM customers LEFT JOIN subscriptions ON customers.customer_id = subscriptions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, pricing_tiers.tier_name, pricing_tiers.price FROM customers JOIN subscriptions ON customers.customer_id = subscriptions.customer_id JOIN plans ON subscriptions.plan_id = plans.plan_id JOIN pricing_tiers ON plans.plan_id = pricing_tiers.plan_id ORDER BY pricing_tiers.price DESC;
